Summary: thought it was a star at first.noticed it was moving left to right very hi in the sky
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shoreline
There were no other sightings in Shoreline on or around February 18th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswent outside for a smoke and looked to the sky as i alway's do shoreline washington north of seattle.noticed another star that was more colorful than the rest and leaned up to the house to make sure i was not moving.the object had moved behind a tree so i moved 4 feet to my right and noticed it had moved signifinitly. double checked from where i was standing and confirmed to my self that what ever it was,it was moving. then it started to move left to right as if it was avoiding me or playing hide and seek.after five minutes i got bored and went inside to post my sighting.double checked at 1:10 am and it was gone. I have seen ufo's in 3 states and had a experience with other's in lake tahoe.very close encounter in tacoma 6th ave behind clover leaf on baseball field,hair standing up,very bright.
